original_text: And he shall return to his land with great wealth, but his heart shall be set against the holy covenant. And he shall work his will and return to his own land.
korean_text: 북방 왕은 많은 재물을 가지고 본국으로 돌아가리니 그는 마음으로 언약을 거스르며 자기 마음대로 행하고 본토로 돌아갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he shall return to his land with great wealth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 큰 부를 가지고 자기 땅으로 돌아올 것이라

sentences.original_text: but his heart shall be set against the holy covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 마음은 거룩한 언약을 대적하게 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: And he shall work his will
and return to his own land
